title.rendered: “Digiperform is the Perfect place to learn digital marketing.” -Arpitha

content.rendered:
Career change is never easy especially if you are someone who has completed Majors in a particular field. But once a person decides to take charge and work towards a new perspective field, there is no looking back.  Such is the story of Digiperformer Arpitha. She completed her Digital Marketing course from Digiperform Malleshwaram. We had the opportunity to talk to her about her experience in Digiperform. Readout to know more!

It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

I am Arpitha, I hold a master’s degree in Technology. I started my career as a lecturer but now I am shifting to digital marketing. 

What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

As a lecturer, I did not see my career going high up at a fast pace. Hence, for a better career opportunity, I decided to switch. Digital marketing provides a fast-paced working environment and that’s what I was looking for.

What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

When I was researching institutes to learn Digital marketing, I found out that Digiperform had the best reviews among all the other institutes. Along with that its placements were very talked about. So, I decided to opt for it.

Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Yes, I would surely consider Digiperform as a trusted and reliable resource because of its way of training, training content, amazing faculty, and placement opportunities. 

If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

 I would give it 8.

Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

I see myself starting a Digital Marketing service company.

If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

I think it is very important to use learning in a practical set up. So even if the experience is unpaid, it is good to start with.

Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Perfect place to learn digital marketing.
